Description:
Our client is one of the UAE's leading homegrown F&B manufacturing and distribution companies and partners of the world's most prominent brands. We are looking for interns, who are interested to learn and grow with the company.Key Responsibilities:Collaborate with various departments to gain exposure to different facets of the operations.
Assist in day-to-day tasks and projects, contributing your enthusiasm and fresh perspectives.
Learn about industry processes, quality standards, and business operations through hands-on experience.
Engage in teamwork and cross-functional collaboration to support the company's growth.Qualifications:Emarati National.
Enthusiastic and eager to learn.
Good communication skills in English and Arabic
Ability to work effectively in a team.
Strong attention to detail.Duration: This internship is a 3-6 months commitment, with a possibility of extension or converted to a full-time employment based on the performanceBenefits:Valuable exposure
Opportunity to work with experienced professionals.
Networking opportunities within the organization.
Potential for future growth and career development.
Stipend or compensation as per industry standards.Job Details
